author: Source: KMIZ
title: 'Hello': Adele debuts first single in 3 years - KMIZ
text:
British singer Adele released her first new single in three years on Friday -- a powerful, slow-paced torch song that sent fans into raptures on social media. "Hello," her first release since the Oscar-winning James Bond theme "Skyfall," is vintage Adele -- a huge, emotional ballad directed at a lost lover.
 KMIZ.
